title: The Face of North Sydney (PC)
brief_description: This disc contains over 3,700 photographs, the full text of “Naming North Sydney” (an historical dictionary of place names) and the full text of 24 heritage leaflets. It has been produced by North Sydney Council’s Stanton Library. The Local Studies Collection, from which the photographs are taken is located within the library (234 Miller Street, North Sydney).
